title: Update Account Contact Information
description: A customer wants to update the phone number and email address on their account.

tasks.description: Authenticate the customer's identity using security questions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully verifies the customer's identity.

tasks.description: Collect the new phone number and email address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately records the new contact details.

tasks.description: Update the customer's profile in the customer information system (CIS).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the information in the system.
